revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Terminus Cave |image = [[File:Terminus Cave.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Terminus Cave. |tokens = 700,000 |location = East of Route 18. }} '''Terminus Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
== Random Encounters ==
